patterns: Can you tell me the weather?
responses: I can't provide real-time weather, but you can check your local weather app or website!
You can check the current weather using your device's weather app.
Try checking a website like Weather.com for accurate weather information.

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I don't have access to the current time, but you can check it on your device!
The time is available on your device's clock.
I recommend checking your phone or computer for the exact time.

patterns: Can you tell me the date?
responses: Today's date is available on your device, but I can check it for you if you want.
The date can be found on your device's calendar or home screen.
You can find today's date easily by checking your phone or computer.

patterns: Can you do something for me?
responses: Of course! What do you need help with?
I'm here to assist you. What do you need?
Let me know what you're looking for, and I'll help you out!
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they'd crack each other up!
